definition.text: Delegate Power is the Token Power that goes into the Delegation Program. Only 10% of the Delegate Power flowing into a User Delegate node reaches the recipient User Profile.

translations.text: Delegate Power (Делегированная сила) - это Token Power ("Сила токена"), которая поступает в программу делегирования (Delegation Program). Только 10% делегированной силы, поступающей в узел User Delegate, достигает профиля пользователя-получателя.

paragraphs.text: Right click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
